category: Member sport organization regulations/Article 19-4 (Return of deposit)
contents: Article 19-4 (Return of Deposit) ① Member sports organizations must return part or all of the deposit paid pursuant to Article 19-2, Paragraph 1 to the candidate within 30 days if any of the following applies. The deposited money belongs to the member sports organization. Revised on October 6, 2021. 1. If the candidate is elected or dies, or if he or she receives more than 15/100 of the total number of valid votes, the entire deposit amount. 2. If the candidate receives more than 10/100 or more of the total number of valid votes, 15/100 of the total number of valid votes. In case of receiving less than 100 votes, an amount equivalent to 50/100 of the deposited amount. ② The ratio of the total number of valid votes set as the standard for returning the deposited money pursuant to Paragraph 1, Items 1 and 2 shall be 100% depending on the characteristics of the member organization. It can be set within the range of 25. Revised on October 6, 2021 [This Article Newly Inserted on December 20, 2018]
